byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

abstract: Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas addresses United Nations Human Rights Council meeting in Geneva, and asks for assistance in quelling recent violence between Israelis and Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Abbas, president of the Palestinian Authority, appeared before the United Nations Human Rights Council to ask for help to defuse a wave of violence between Palestinians and Israelis.

headline.main: Mahmoud Abbas Seeks U.N. ‘Protection’ for Palestinians
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Abbas Seeks United Nations Help to Defuse Recent Wave of Violence

snippet: Mr. Abbas, president of the Palestinian Authority, appeared before the United Nations Human Rights Council to ask for help to defuse a wave of violence between Palestinians and Israelis.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
